name: Chicken.
description:
"Welcome to the first iteration of the worlds FIRST virtual chicken farm, presented by Virtual Chicken Industries!
The software you're about to test is in early stages, so expect minor hiccups and unpleasent glitches.
Everything you need to know is presented within the test software itself!
Enjoy!"

Programs used:

  • Godot
  • Aseprite
  • Paint.Net
  • Audacity
  • Bosca Ceoil
